pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

sentences.english: It had the spiral structure revealed by congo red.
sentences.chinese: 具有與剛果紅結合的螺旋結構。

sentences.english: The Congo people decorate their pipes with figural and geometric patterns.
sentences.chinese: 剛果人民用幾和形狀的樣式裝飾他們的菸斗。

sentences.english: Ngoy-Mulunda is calling for the Congolese people to go and vote as that is their right.
sentences.chinese: 穆倫達呼籲剛果人民投票，因爲這是他們的權利。

sentences.english: He was born in Congo, but he's a citizen of Canada.
sentences.chinese: 他生於剛果，但他是加拿年夜平正易近。

sentences.english: And Caroline Hurford says Congo is not alone.
sentences.chinese: 然而赫福德表示，剛果並非特例。

sentences.english: World Vision works with thousands of children in the Democratic Republic of Congo .
sentences.chinese: 世界宣明會與成千上萬的兒童在剛果民主共和國。

sentences.english: This one is about how Congo's elite has underdeveloped this vast, poor, mineral-rich country
sentences.chinese: 這個笑話是講述剛果的精英如何發展他們的國家的。

sentences.english: Only about 380 of these Gorillas can be found in the DRC.
sentences.chinese: 剛果民主共和國境內約有380只銀背山地大猩猩。

sentences.english: Lt Col Mayele was arrested in Walikale in eastern Congo.
sentences.chinese: 指揮官馬耶勒在剛果東部的瓦利卡爾被捕。

sentences.english: Analysts often use the phrase "culture of impunity" to describe Congo.
sentences.chinese: 分析人士常用“免罪文化”來形容剛果。

sentences.english: Congo is also one of the last places on earth with tribes of cannibals.
sentences.chinese: 剛果也是世界上食人部落存在的最大的國家。

sentences.english: 1971 - Democratic Republic of the Congo is renamed Zaire.
sentences.chinese: 1971年的今天，剛果民主共和國重命名爲扎伊爾。

sentences.english: Yeah, a lot of African music like Congolese music and music from Mali.
sentences.chinese: 很多非洲音樂，像剛果樂和馬裏的音樂。

sentences.english: Congo had recorded its last case of indigenous polio in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 剛果記錄的最後一例本土脊灰病例發生在2000年。

sentences.english: Pygmy Family, Republic of the Congo, 2000
sentences.chinese: 俾格米人一傢，剛果民主共和國，2000。

sentences.english: Michael K. Nichols Pygmy Family, Republic of the Congo, 2000
sentences.chinese: 俾格米人一家，剛果民主共和國，2000。

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: East Timor (officially Democratic Republic of Timor-Leste)
Kenya (Tw) (written as 肯尼亞|肯尼亚 in PRC)
